132.content: What reasons would Corrin be in diapers?
132.title: Corrin

1321.content:
After a long and busy day with her sibling.
Corrin needed some time to herself.
So she decided to head back to her private quarters.



What was the first thing she did when she arrived at her room?
1321.title: She like them

choices: no one came into her room (she's safe)
13211.content:
"Whew... what a busy day." said Corrin as she lay down on her bed. "Who knew spending time with all 8 of my sibling can worn your out. It a good thing I get to spend all afternoon to myself. Which is actually a perfect opportunity to get into something more comfortable." and so Corrin got off her bed and open a secret compartment located under her mat. And retrieved a white t-shirt, a changing mat, some wipes, a bottle of baby powder, a pacifier, and a pack of diapers from inside.

Corrin then get undress and lay down on the changing mat with nothing but a white t-shirt on. She then start powdering herself and then put the diaper on. As she got up she walk to her mirror look into it. She giggled to herself and rubbed her hand on the front of her diaper. "I'm amazed how super comfy these diapers are!" said Corrin

What happens next?
13211.title: Lay on her bed

choices: someone came into her room this time
no one came into her room (she's still safe)
132112.content:
Corrin then grab a pacifier and starts sucking on it. and then she lay back on her bed and grab her Nintendo switch and play on it for a while. After a half a hour of gaming. She feel the urge to pee. But as she got up and about to head to the bathroom. She remember she wearing a diaper. "Oh yeah... I don't need to go to the bathroom, I can just go in my diaper." said Corrin and so she let it all go in her diaper. Her diaper is a little soak now. "(sigh) that felt so good, but I think I'll be a lot happier in a clean diaper." said Corrin.
And so Corrin got out the changing mat again and lay down on it. She took off her wet diaper and grab a hygienic wipe and wipe herself with it. After that she powdered herself again and put a clean diaper on. She then stand up and rubbed her hand on the back of her new clean diaper. "(sigh) that better, a clean cushiony bottom is a happy bottom. (giggled)" giggled Corrin.

What happens next?
132112.title: no one came into her room (she's safe)

choices: No one came into her room (She's safe)

Which is actually a perfect opportunity to get into something more comfortable." and so Corrin got off her chair and open a secret compartment located under her mat. And retrieved a white t-shirt, a changing mat, some wipes, a bottle of baby powder, a pacifier, and a pack of diapers from inside.

Corrin then get undress and lay down on the changing mat with nothing but a white t-shirt on. She then start powdering herself and then put the diaper on. As she got up she walk to her mirror look into it. She giggled to herself and rubbed her hand on the front of her diaper. "I'm amazed how super comfy these diapers are!" said Corrin

Hopefully these servents can handle another duty... Their own... That was bad and I do feel bad... Moving on:
135.title: Lovely maids.

1353.title: Other girls.

info.brief_description: ABDL Fire Emblem stories, what more is there to say?
info.description:
RULES
1. No sexual intercourse for characters that are under 18 years of age, or related by blood. I will remove chapters containing said content if I spot them.
2. No gore/vore/whatever else in that same vein. I would prefer that you really stick to BDSM, infantilism, and fetishes that can be linked to it. And please, try to avoid fetishistic concepts and such for characters that are below 18 years of age.
3.Have fun, don't be stupid!
